org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer

Class MapMarkerCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapObjectImpl
      • org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapMarkerCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICoordinate, MapMarker, MapObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapMarkerDot

    public class MapMarkerCircle
extends MapObjectImpl
implements MapMarker
    A simple implementation of the MapMarker interface. Each map marker is painted as a circle with a black border line and filled with a specified color.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.interfaces.MapMarker
